name: Clicker builder
description:
This week we had a workshop which the subject was the UX design I learned how an interface is read and how to make a good game-feel. For this second part our teacher gave us an exercice which was to do a clicker whith a linear based progression and a logarithmic based progression.

The goal is to build a wall as long as possible to make America great again!

Graphic assets mades by Antonin Bauville
